pages.text: Holds a moderate quantity of fluid and allows for it to be dispensed. Press '$(k:cofh.mode_change_increment)' to toggle Empty/Fill mode. Use while sneaking to activate or deactivate automatic replenishment of most other held (or worn) fluid containers. It can be filled with fluid and augmented in the Tinker's Workbench.

pages.title: Reservoir
pages.text: It can be enchanted with $(l:thermal:world/holding)Holding$(/l) to improve fluid capacity.
